display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
display_long_description_unprocessed:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75443251_612261381345182_5674533115764706962_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=VZIOzFzMwWcQ7kNvwFr0t_9&_nc_oc=Adn47Z14QT3Fl62dKdwOxFCHGtuEQomwk4ESzjwndFk7dT6qSsRiDC57lEkJljSeGjI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8hXCUscuIeZlYB7GlPUhfA&oh=00_AfmqcfPzwIz_AFx4yEJ8Y1ZK9D3j_M4a9TOAwRzxxV4AWw&oe=695A1F00)
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=AAyJkylRM78Q7kNvwEhhw39&_nc_oc=Adl_WOK9SFm7kAS28_SCV768YOIfyg7mFEqNXMrcX5BW06lhOxJHlzgYTkaMQWP8jyQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8hXCUscuIeZlYB7GlPUhfA&oh=00_Afmf7hxjqcGBFZQTP_xqNkLgpkdiuQ8V1qUYAcP922iYVw&oe=695A0DB8)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=iP5xgQAimWAQ7kNvwH1Xaps&_nc_oc=AdkiXwlFZRLiu_H7kd86FDNbjIc_lsPl-33-at97chAsb_z3ugoWV7CPcsq61OyNOeQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8hXCUscuIeZlYB7GlPUhfA&oh=00_AfkI5ZrsWiBJGg6Mh3LUl83fYVJN0R_XH6rVlxLG3AlVkQ&oe=695A1324)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031422_997444645745145_5320263794737829877_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Ykxk3eBlHAkQ7kNvwHDluJs&_nc_oc=AdmUP9eBfzlT27Jl8sBnXLredPXkvIq62JEUZCtse2GTHB-nUltWZmJx4I-pte3gcpI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=8hXCUscuIeZlYB7GlPUhfA&oh=00_Afmf0UZ55b6mdSXGhkecn0Tp_NxUkZi2inmKK1Y_cfrbMg&oe=695A034E)

There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
